text: Samuel A. Massell Jr. (August 26, 1927 â€“ March 13, 2022) was an American businessman and politician. From 1970 to 1974, he was the 53rd Mayor of Atlanta, Georgia. He is the first Jewish mayor in the city's history. He died on March 13, 2022, at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sam Massell papers from the Digital Library of Georgia Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mayors of Atlanta Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Georgia State University alumni
title: Sam Massell
